title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4226.12 - Horse to be schooled before starting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4226.12 - Horse to be schooled before starting

State Regulations

All horses shall be schooled properly before starting
and, upon the report of the starter, the judges may suspend any trainer who, after being notified shall start an unruly horse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4226.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
